xtc.lang

Class JavaAstSimplifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.tree.Visitor
      • xtc.lang.JavaAstSimplifier

  • public class JavaAstSimplifier
extends Visitor
    A visitor that simplifies Java ASTs. Turns BasicCastExpression into CastExpression, and turns ConstructorDeclaration into MethodDeclaration. Subsumes Dimensions into the close-by Type wherever possible. The resulting AST uses only GNode names that occur in the original grammar.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JavaAstSimplifier() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GNode copyLoc(GNode nOld, GNode nNew)
      Copy location from nOld to nNew, then return nNew.
      Node visit(Node n)
      Catch-all visit method, replaces subtrees in-place by dispatched version.
      GNode visitBasicCastExpression(GNode n)
      Turn BasicCastExpression into general CastExpression.
      GNode visitConstructorDeclaration(GNode n)
      Turn ConstructorDeclaration into general MethodDeclaration.
      GNode visitFormalParameter(GNode n)
      Move dimensions from parameter declaration into declared type of the parameter.
      GNode visitMethodDeclaration(GNode n)
      Move dimensions from method declaration into the return type.
      GNode visitUnaryExpression(GNode n)
      Move unary minus into IntegerLiteral, to simplify checking that the literal is valid in Java.
